[en].Domain::VolumeFile: file full path to the volume file, file mst be in the uchar binary format
[en].Domain::Dim: dimension of the data array stored in the volume file
[en].Domain::OriginType: similar to --srcfrom0, 1 if the origin is [0 0 0], 0 if it is [1.0,1.0,1.0]
[en].Domain::Step: do not change this, should be always be 1
[en].Domain::CacheBoxP0:
for cachebox mcx with -R negative_num, this specifies a 3D index for 
                               a corner of the cache region, in grid unit
[en].Domain::CacheBoxP1: the other corner, the starting value of the indices is 1
[en].Domain::Media:
the first medium is always assigned to voxels with a value of 0 or outside of
                         the volume, the second row is for medium type 1, and so on. mua and mus must 
                         be in 1/mm unit
[en].Session::Photons: if -n is not specified in the command line, this defines the total photon number
[en].Session::ID: if -s is not specified in the command line, this defines the output file name stub
[en].Forward::T0: the start time of the simulation, in seconds
[en].Forward::T1: the end time of the simulation, in seconds
[en].Forward::Dt: the width of each time window, in seconds
[en].Optode::Source::Pos: the grid position of the source, can be non-integers, in grid unit
[en].Optode::Detector::Pos: the grid position of a detector, can be non-integers, in grid unit
[en].Optode::Source::Dir: the unitary directional vector of the photon at launch
[en].Optode::Source::Type:
source types, must be one of the following: 
                   pencil,isotropic,cone,gaussian,planar,pattern,fourier,arcsine,disk
